description: The PaymentRequest API prompts the user to make a payment through the browser's user interface.
description_html: The PaymentRequest API prompts the user to make a payment through the browser's user interface.
name: Payment request

flags.name: dom.payments.request.supportedRegions
flags.value_to_set: A comma-delimited list of one or more 2-character ISO country codes indicating the countries in which to support payments (for example, US,CA).
